channel.title: Big project well kinda
channel.description:
I know how to code but lately i have been in HTML creating a loader to read if you have voted once you have voted it generates a code and sends to your email. Then that code is used to get your item. But the thing is i need a code ingame but what would it be A ::pickup commands with 'This can only be used once a day' 'Please try again in 23 hours'
And i was thinking for the code generator it is hosted online but the codes sources from a folder like 'Charecters' it updates itself everytime someone creates an account . But i want to change that to codes and for it to terminate itself so it can't be used again .
We have really good Coders here Please help me :]

item.title: Big project well kinda
item.dc:creator: @Techhoster Techhoster
item.description:
@Techhoster wrote:

I know how to code but lately i have been in HTML creating a loader to read if you have voted once you have voted it generates a code and sends to your email. Then that code is used to get your item. But the thing is i need a code ingame but what would it be A ::pickup commands with ‘This can only be used once a day’ ‘Please try again in 23 hours’

And i was thinking for the code generator it is hosted online but the codes sources from a folder like ‘Charecters’ it updates itself everytime someone creates an account . But i want to change that to codes and for it to terminate itself so it can’t be used again .

We have really good Coders here Please help me :]
